S

sendFriendRequest(String, String, String) - Method in class controller.ServiceController
 
ServerConfig - Class in thefourmarauders
Class representing the server configuration for running the server
ServerConfig() - Constructor for class thefourmarauders.ServerConfig
No arg constructor with default values
ServerConfig(StorageConfig, AuthConfig, int, int) - Constructor for class thefourmarauders.ServerConfig
Constructor in which you specify all the values, also used as the constructor for json deserialization
ServiceController - Class in controller
Interface between WebServer endpoints and back end services (auth and storage)
ServiceController(AuthenticationService, StorageService) - Constructor for class controller.ServiceController
 
ServiceFactory - Class in controller
Creates an instance of a ServiceController based on any combination of AuthConfig and StorageConfig, or a ServiceConfig which contains both AuthConfig and StorageConfig as well as other server params
ServiceFactory() - Constructor for class controller.ServiceFactory
 
setAuthType(AuthConfig.AuthType) - Method in class controller.AuthConfig
 
setName(String) - Method in class storage.mongostoragemodel.Group
 
setPort(int) - Method in class thefourmarauders.ServerConfig
sets the port
setStorageType(StorageConfig.StorageType) - Method in class controller.StorageConfig
 
setUsername(String) - Method in class thefourmarauders.requestschema.UserCreationRequest
 
storage - package storage
Contains all classes pertaining to storage services, including schema, and inter-service datatypes, as well as storage based exceptions.
storage.datatypes - package storage.datatypes
Defines datatypes used internally between services (inter-service representations of common objects)
storage.mongostoragemodel - package storage.mongostoragemodel
Defines the schema for mongo storage, similar to storage.datatypes, but could in theory be different.
StorageConfig - Class in controller
Defines a configuration for a storage service, including any urls, storage name, and type
StorageConfig() - Constructor for class controller.StorageConfig
Construct with default values
StorageConfig(String, String, List<String>) - Constructor for class controller.StorageConfig
Construct a StorageConfig with the given properties
StorageConfig.StorageType - Enum in controller
Defines implemented StorageType, currently includes StorageType.MEMORY and StorageType.MONGO
StorageException - Exception in storage
A class representing an exception that happens when a storage error occurs, usually this is caused by an internal error - HTTP error code 500
StorageException(String) - Constructor for exception storage.StorageException
Constructor in which you can pass an error message
StorageService - Interface in storage
Interface representing everything needed for a storage service
